about_the_game:
About the game


SUMS is a thrilling roguelike 2D adventure in which you and your friends explore the murky depths of a mysterious dungeon. After your ship is destroyed, you awaken on a strange, cursed island - created by none other than the maniacal Professor Vincent von Vincent. With no way to escape, he forces you and your friends into a dangerous dungeon from which only the bravest adventurers can escape alive.

Your goal? Survive, defeat monsters and earn as many points as possible while trying to escape the ominous depths of the dungeon.


Class

Choose from one of three classes to find the right hero for you to immerse yourself in. Your friends might need it.

Are you ready to survive the dungeon and get the highest score?

Team up with your friends and find out as you battle the pitfalls of the dungeon together and try to escape Professor Vincent's diabolical plans. But remember: only the best escape!
